messages.message: I'm trying to send API calls from postman to my crafting sandbox and I got `"Click "Sign in" to visit the Single Sign On page and login. You need to login to Crafting Sandbox for accessing this authenticated endpoint."` message. Does anyone know a way to work around this?
Maybe we need to port forwarding the server-nginx endpoint :thinking_face:
ah ok. i should have tried it out first. It works using the port forwarding tricks
